attributes.action: Give Taxpayers the money  rather than the banks, they will put it in the banks by spending it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government really want to do some thing to stimulate the economy, give each tax payer £100,000or some portion of the billions being thrown to the banks, that will go into the banks, then it will be spent, by reducing mortgages,or on moving, or on building or even just in retail, but it will all be spent boosting the economy and will finishish up in a bank.

170 billion between the taxpayers would do a lot to stimulate the economy.

rejection.details: Similar petitions are already live on the system. Please search for one and sign it.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
